body: get_current_items get_current_items(items:Iterable[Union[~T, schedule.schedule.Scheduler[~T]]], run_modes:Union[str, Iterable[str], NoneType]=None, epoch:Union[int, NoneType]=None) -> List[~T] Select items which should be executed for given mode and epoch. Args: items : A list of possible items or Schedulers of items to choose from. run_modes : The desired execution mode. One or more of "train", "eval", "test", or "infer". If None, items of all modes will be returned. epoch : The desired execution epoch. If None, items across all epochs will be returned. Returns: The items which should be executed.
title: get_current_items
